original_text: Yet at the same time many even among the leaders believed in him. But because of the Pharisees they would not openly acknowledge their faith for fear they would be put out of the synagogue;
korean_text: 그러나 관리 중에도 그를 믿는 자가 많되 바리새인들 때문에 드러나게 말하지 못하니 이는 출교를 당할까 두려워함이라

sentences.original_text: they would not openly acknowledge their faith
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 믿음을 공개적으로 인정하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: for fear they would be put out of the synagogue
